header_text: You are at a workshop, and the leader asks all attendees to stand up and introduce themselves. During your brief presentation, you momentarily forget what you planned to say, and the audience stares at you looking annoyed.

elements.Text: Did the other people think you were boring?

elements.name: You are at a workshop, and the leader asks all attendees to stand up and introduce themselves. During your brief presentation, you momentarily forget what you planned to say, and the audience stares at you looking annoyed. _Social Situations_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
